summary: In 1648 France, it's the sons (and daughter) of the Three Musketeers to the rescue!
cast: Cornel Wilde|Maureen O'Hara|Robert Douglas|Gladys Cooper|June Clayworth|Dan O'Herlihy|Alan Hale Jr.|Blanche Yurka|Nancy Gates|Edmund Breon|Peter Miles|George Petrie|Moroni Olsen|Eric Alden|Fred Aldrich|Gregg Barton|Barry Brooks|Albert Cavens|Tanis Chandler|Tristram Coffin|Ned Davenport|Boyd Davis|Julia Dean|Claude Dunkin|Art Dupuis|Richard Glynn|Holmes Herbert|Ed Hinton|Fred Kohler Jr.|Lucien Littlefield|George Magrill|Gregory Marshall|Mickey McCardle|Keith McConnell|John McKee|Patrick O'Moore|Dewey Robinson|Reginald Sheffield|Philip Van Zandt
title: Los hijos de los mosqueteros
